mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date) VALUES( seq_product_prod_no.nextval, #{prodName:VARCHAR}, #{prodDetail:VARCHAR}, #{manuDate:VARCHAR}, #{price:INTEGER}, #{fileName:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
